reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 520/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - TOWNSHIP OF LOYALIST
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — TOWNSHIP OF LOYALIST
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 520/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - TOWNSHIP OF LOYALIST
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Township of Loyalist with respect to all applications made on or after September 30, 1998 for land situate in the municipality. O. Reg. 520/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 40/01, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 1. The authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and under section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Township of Loyalist with respect to all applications made on or after September 30, 1998 for land situate in the municipality. O. Reg. 520/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 40/01, s. 2.

content.content:
2. Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and section 50 of the Condominium Act
to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Township of Loyalist with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 520/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision and section 50 of the Condominium Act to approve or exempt a condominium description is delegated to the council of the Township of Loyalist with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 520/98, s. 2.

content.content: 2.1 The delegation of the Minister’s authority to the Township of Loyalist to approve a plan of subdivision under section 51 of the Act is withdrawn with respect to an application with the file number 11 T 89001. O. Reg. 719/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2.1 The delegation of the Minister’s authority to the Township of Loyalist to approve a plan of subdivision under section 51 of the Act is withdrawn with respect to an application with the file number 11 T 89001. O. Reg. 719/98, s. 1.

content.content: 3. (1) If any authority delegated under this Regulation is in turn delegated to a committee of the municipality or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the municipality shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 520/98, s. 3 (1); O. Reg. 40/01, s. 3. (2) A delegation of authority in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 520/98, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) If any authority delegated under this Regulation is in turn delegated to a committee of the municipality or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the municipality shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 520/98, s. 3 (1); O. Reg. 40/01, s. 3.

(2) A delegation of authority in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 520/98, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 520/98, s. 4. Schedule 11 T 97002 11 T 97001 11 T 96001 11 T 93001 11 T 91003 11 T 89007 11 T 89006 O. Reg. 520/98, Sched.; O. Reg. 719/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 520/98, s. 4.
